properties.verseOrder: c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1.Ya divai na ya mkate, nyoyo zetu upokee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2.Ya matendo na mawazo, nia zetu upokee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3.Ya Abeli iwe mfano, sadaka hii upendeze

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4.Mikononi mwake padre ni sadaka yetu sote
